title: 旧约 - 诗篇(Psalms) - 第 67 章
subTitle: 旧约 -- 诗篇(Psalms) -- 第 67 章 ( 本篇共有 150 章 )

lineList.en: God be merciful unto us, and bless us; and cause his face to shine upon us; Selah.
lineList.cn: （一篇诗歌，交与伶长。用丝弦的乐器）愿神怜悯我们，赐福与我们，用脸光照我们。（细拉）

lineList.en: That thy way may be known upon earth, thy saving health among all nations.
lineList.cn: 好叫世界得知你的道路，万国得知你的救恩。

lineList.en: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
lineList.cn: 神阿，愿列邦称赞你，愿万民都称赞你。

lineList.en: O let the nations be glad and sing for joy: for thou shalt judge the people righteously, and govern the nations upon earth. Selah.
lineList.cn: 愿万国都快乐欢呼。因为你必按公正审判万民，引导世上的万国。（细拉）

lineList.en: Let the people praise thee, O God; let all the people praise thee.
lineList.cn: 神阿，愿列邦称赞你。愿万民都称赞你。

lineList.en: Then shall the earth yield her increase; and God, even our own God, shall bless us.
lineList.cn: 地已经出了土产。神，就是我们的神，要赐福与我们。

lineList.en: God shall bless us; and all the ends of the earth shall fear him.
lineList.cn: 神要赐福与我们。地的四极都要敬畏他。
